entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 3:09 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -28.6°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
